Method.doc:
Binds hotkeys for MouseCircle

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
  * show - This will cause the mouse circle to be drawn
Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
* show - This will cause the mouse circle to be drawn

Method.desc: Draws a circle around the mouse
Method.doc:
Draws a circle around the mouse

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
Method.name: show

Variable.desc: An `hs.drawing.color` table defining the colour of the circle. Defaults to red.
Variable.doc: An `hs.drawing.color` table defining the colour of the circle. Defaults to red.
Variable.name: color

desc: Draws a circle around the mouse pointer when a hotkey is pressed
doc:
